Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
hospital.appointmentmanagement.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
Represents an appointment in the system, storing details such as date, time, status, and prescribed medicines. Provides methods for managing the lifecycle of appointments, including saving, rescheduling, canceling, and recording outcomes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String appointmentID, int patientID, String doctorID, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, AppointmentManager appointmentManager)
      Constructs an Appointment with an AppointmentManager instance.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique ID for the appointment.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment.
      appointmentManager - The AppointmentManager instance for managing appointments.

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String appointmentID, int patientID, String doctorID, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime)
      Constructs an Appointment without an AppointmentManager instance.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique ID for the appointment.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment.

  • Method Details

    • saveAppointmentToFile

      public void saveAppointmentToFile()
      Saves the appointment details to a file.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public void updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentID, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of an appointment and reloads data.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique ID of the appointment to update.
      newStatus - The new status for the appointment.

    • viewAppointmentDetails

      public void viewAppointmentDetails()
      Displays the details of the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(LocalDate newDate, LocalTime newTime)
      Reschedules the appointment to a new date and time.
      Parameters:
      newDate - The new date for the appointment.
      newTime - The new time for the appointment.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment()
      Cancels the appointment and updates the file.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String newStatus)
      Sets a new status for the appointment after validation.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status for the appointment.

    • isValidStatusTransition

      private boolean isValidStatusTransition(String currentStatus, String newStatus)
      Checks if a status transition is valid based on the current status.
      Parameters:
      currentStatus - The current status of the appointment.
      newStatus - The new status being transitioned to.
      Returns:
      true if the status transition is valid, false otherwise.

    • setPrescribedMedicineStatus

      public void setPrescribedMedicineStatus(String status)
      Sets the prescribed medicine status for the appointment.
      Parameters:
      status - The new status for the prescribed medicines.

    • setOutcomeRecord

      public void setOutcomeRecord(String serviceType, String consultationNotes, List<String> medicines, List<Integer> medicineQuantities, String medicineStatus)
      Records the outcome of the appointment after it is completed.
      Parameters:
      serviceType - The type of service provided during the appointment.
      consultationNotes - The notes recorded during the consultation.
      medicines - The list of prescribed medicines.
      medicineQuantities - The quantities of the prescribed medicines.
      medicineStatus - The status of the prescribed medicines.

    • isLunchTime

      private boolean isLunchTime(LocalTime time)
      Checks if the provided time is during lunch hours.
      Parameters:
      time - The time to check.
      Returns:
      true if the time is lunch time, false otherwise.

    • isWithinOperatingHours

      private boolean isWithinOperatingHours(LocalTime time)
      Checks if the provided time is within operating hours.
      Parameters:
      time - The time to check.
      Returns:
      true if the time is within operating hours, false otherwise.

      public String getOutcomeRecord()
      Retrieves the outcome record for the appointment, if completed.
      Returns:
      The outcome record, or a message indicating no outcome if not completed.
